Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to our dedication to excellence. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would significantly enhance your daily life or work efficiency. For this remarkable product, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $125. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to bringing this valuable asset into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
